content.query:
SELECT Labor
FROM OPENROWSET('CosmosDB',
    'Account=lmt-cdba-core-uat-eastus;Database=lmt-cdb-core-uat;Key={update key here}',
LaborTransactionAudit) AS LaborTransactionAudit

WHERE JSON_Value(Labor,'$.submittedFor') = 'daveb'
AND JSON_Value(Labor,'$.laborDate') > '2021-02-15T00:00:00' 
AND JSON_Value(Labor,'$.laborDate') < '2021-08-15T00:00:00' 
ORDER BY JSON_Value(Labor,'$.laborDate')
